tokens.name: Ethereum Token
tokens.description: Ethereum is a global, open-source platform for decentralized applications. Eth is fueling transactions on the Chain.

tokens.name: USD Coin
tokens.description: USD Coin (known by its ticker USDC) is a stablecoin that is pegged to the U.S. dollar on a 1:1 basis.

tokens.name: XRP Token
tokens.description: XRP is a digital asset built for payments. It is the native digital asset on the XRP Ledger—an open-source, permissionless and decentralized blockchain technology that can settle transactions in 3-5 seconds.

tokens.name: Cardano Token
tokens.description: Cardano (ADA) is a decentralized platform that will allow complex programmable transfers of value in a secure and scalable fashion. Cardano is built in the secure Haskell programming language.

tokens.name: Avalanche
tokens.description: Avalanche is an umbrella platform for launching decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, financial assets, trading and other services.

tokens.name: Polkadot Token
tokens.description: Polkadot is a blockchain project that aims to connect blockchains, to enable the transfer of value and logic across chains. DOT is the native coin of the network.

tokens.name: BUSD Token
tokens.description: BUSD is a 1:1 USD-backed stablecoin approved by the New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS), issued in partnership with Paxos.

tokens.name: Tether USD
tokens.description: Tether USD is a stablecoin, a type of cryptocurrency that is pegged to a fiat currency, namely the U.S. dollar.

tokens.name: Dogecoin
tokens.description: Dogecoin (DOGE) is based on the popular 'doge' Internet meme and features a Shiba Inu on its logo. Dogecoin's creators envisaged it as a fun, light-hearted cryptocurrency. that would have greater appeal beyond the core Bitcoin audience, since it was based on a dog meme.

tokens.name: Wrapped UST Token
tokens.description: TerraUSD is a decentralized stablecoin that is scalable, yield bearing and interchain (1 UST = 1 USD)

tokens.name: SHIBA INU
tokens.description: SHIBA INU is an experiment in decentralized spontaneous community building.

tokens.name: Cosmos Token
tokens.description: Cosmos is a decentralized network of independent parallel blockchains, each powered by BFT consensus algorithms like Tendermint consensus.

tokens.name: Litecoin Token
tokens.description: Litecoin is a peer-to-peer Internet currency that enables instant, near-zero cost payments to anyone in the world. Litecoin is an open source, global payment network that is fully decentralized without any central authorities.

tokens.name: NEAR Protocol
tokens.description: NEAR Protocol is a decentralized application platform designed to make apps usable on the web. The network runs on a Proof-of-Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism called Nightshade, which aims to offer scalability and stable fees.

tokens.name: ChainLink Token
tokens.description: A blockchain-based middleware, acting as a bridge between cryptocurrency smart contracts, data feeds, APIs and traditional bank account payments.

tokens.name: Uniswap
tokens.description: Uniswap is an automated liquidity protocol powered by a constant product formula and implemented in a system of non-upgradeable smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.

tokens.name: TRON
tokens.description: TRON is a blockchain-based operating system with TRX as mainnet token.

tokens.name: Bitcoin Cash Token
tokens.description: Bitcoin ABC is an electronic cash platform that allows peer-to-peer online cash payments. It is a fork (a copy in a way) of Bitcoin (BTC).

tokens.name: Ethereum Classic
tokens.description: Ethereum Classic (ETC) is a hard fork of Ethereum (ETH) that launched in July 2016. Its main function is as a smart contract network, with the ability to host and support decentralized applications (DApps). Its native token is ETC.

tokens.name: Axie Infinity Shard
tokens.description: Axie Infinity is a Pokémon-inspired digital pet universe where anyone can earn tokens through skilled gameplay and contributions to the ecosystem. Players can battle, collect, raise, and build a land-based kingdom for their pets (known as Axies).

tokens.name: Elrond
tokens.description: Elrond is a blockchain protocol that seeks to offer extremely fast transaction speeds by using sharding. The project describes itself as a technology ecosystem for the new internet, which includes fintech, decentralized finance and the Internet of Things.

tokens.name: Fantom
tokens.description: Fantom is a directed acyclic graph (DAG) smart contract platform providing decentralized finance (DeFi) services to developers using its own bespoke consensus algorithm.

tokens.name: Tezos Token
tokens.description: Tezos is a smart contract platform that uses blockchain voting to be self-governing by its token holders. Also, the platform aims to boost the security of smart contracts.

tokens.name: Zcash Token
tokens.description: Zcash (ZEC) is a decentralized and open-source privacy-focused cryptocurrency that enables selective transparency of transactions. Zcash transactions can either be transparent or shielded through a zero-knowledge proof called zk-SNARKs.

tokens.name: FLOW
tokens.description: Flow is a layer-1 blockchain that aims to be fast, decentralized, and developer-oriented. It is designed as the foundation to power games, apps, and the associated digital assets.

tokens.name: EOS Token
tokens.description: EOS is a cryptocurrency token and blockchain that operates as a smart contract platform for the deployment of decentralized applications and decentralized autonomous corporations.

tokens.name: MIOTAC
tokens.description: IOTA is a distributed ledger with its proprietary technology known as Tangle, a system of nodes that confirm transactions. It aims to offer greater speeds than conventional blockchains and an ideal footprint for the ever-expanding Internet of Things ecosystem.

tokens.name: Maker
tokens.description: Maker is a Decentralized Autonomous Organization that creates and insures the dai stablecoin on the Ethereum blockchain

tokens.name: pTokens GALA
tokens.description: Gala Games is dedicated to decentralizing the multi-billion dollar gaming industry by giving players access to their in-game items. Coming from the Co-founder of Zynga and some of the creative minds behind Farmville 2, Gala Games aims to revolutionize gaming.

tokens.name: eCash
tokens.description: eCash is the natural continuation of the Bitcoin Cash project. eCash follows through on key promises such as the innovative Avalanche consensus layer while also introducing concepts such as staking, fork-free network upgrades, and subchains.

tokens.name: TrueUSD
tokens.description: TUSD is a regulated, exchange-independent stablecoin backed 1-for-1 with US Dollars.

tokens.name: Basic Attention Token
tokens.description: The Basic Attention Token is the new token for the digital advertising industry.

tokens.name: Frax Share
tokens.description: FXS is the value accrual and governance token of the entire Frax ecosystem. Frax is a fractional-algorithmic stablecoin protocol. It aims to provide highly scalable, decentralized, algorithmic money in place of fixed-supply assets like BTC.

tokens.name: Pax Dollar
tokens.description: Pax Dollar (USDP) is a digital dollar redeemable one-to-one for US dollars and regulated by the New York Department of Financial Services.

tokens.name: Compound Coin
tokens.description: Compound (COMP) is an ERC-20 asset that powers the community governance of the Compound protocol; COMP token-holders and their delegates debate, propose, and vote on changes to the protocol.

tokens.name: yearn.finance
tokens.description: Yearn.finance is an aggregator service for decentralized finance (DeFi) investors, using automation to allow them to maximize profits from yield farming.

tokens.name: IoTeX Network
tokens.description: Building the Internet of Trusted Things -- Blockchain, IoT, & Privacy.

tokens.name: Smooth Love Potion
tokens.description: Smooth Love Potions (SLP) is a ERC-20 token that is fully tradable.

tokens.name: 1INCH Token
tokens.description: 1inch is a decentralized exchange aggregator that sources liquidity from various exchanges and is capable of splitting a single trade transaction across multiple DEXs. Smart contract technology empowers this aggregator enabling users to optimize and customize their trades.

tokens.name: PAX Gold
tokens.description: PAX Gold (PAXG) tokens each represent one fine troy ounce of an LBMA-certified, London Good Delivery physical gold bar, secured in Brink’s vaults.

tokens.name: Bancor Network Token
tokens.description: Bancor is an on-chain liquidity protocol that enables constant convertibility between tokens. Conversions using Bancor are executed against on-chain liquidity pools using automated market makers to price and process transactions without order books or counterparties.

tokens.name: Ankr
tokens.description: Web3 Infrastructure for All

tokens.name: Zilliqa
tokens.description: Zilliqa (ZIL) is a public blockchain built on a sharded architecture. It has solved blockchain scalability and speed by implementing sharding.

tokens.name: Synthetix Network Token
tokens.description: Synthetix is a derivatives liquidity protocol on Ethereum that enables the issuance and trading of synthetic assets.

tokens.name: Ontology Token
tokens.description: Ontology is a new high-performance public blockchain project & a distributed trust collaboration platform that include a series of complete distributed ledgers and smart contract systems.

tokens.name: JUST
tokens.description: JUST is a (DeFi) ecosystem built for the TRON blockchain. It is an entire suite of products that are mostly centered around a decentralized stablecoin lending platform known as JustStable.

tokens.name: Trust Wallet
tokens.description: Utility token to increase adoption of cryptocurrency.

tokens.name: Kyber Network Crystal
tokens.description: Kyber is a blockchain-based liquidity protocol that aggregates liquidity from a wide range of reserves, powering instant and secure token exchange in any decentralized application.

tokens.name: Coin98
tokens.description: Coin98 enables value transfer as easily as using the Internet by the innovation of Multi-chain Engine, Fully Automatic Liquidity and Space Gate, all in one Super Liquidity Aggregator.

tokens.name: wazirx token
tokens.description: WazirX is a India's cryptocurrency exchange with trading interface and features to buy, sell and trade cryptocurrencies.

tokens.name: Swipe
tokens.description: Swipe is a cryptocurrency wallet and debit card that enables users to spend their cryptocurrencies over the world.

tokens.name: CelerToken
tokens.description: Celer Network is offering layer-2 scaling platform. It brings interactive, secure and low-cost applications to every blockchain.

tokens.name: COTI Token
tokens.description: COTI is an enterprise-grade fintech platform that enables cross-chain interoperability and is built on its own DAG-based chain. It supports extreme scalability, low transaction costs and is supplemented with payment-specific requirements in the form of COTI Pay, a holistic digital payment solution.

tokens.name: MDX Token
tokens.description: MDEX integrates the advantages of multiple chains to create a high-performance composite DEX ecosystem, to maximize the rewards of participants with the 'dual mining incentives' of liquid mining and transaction mining.

tokens.name: Cartesi Token
tokens.description: Cartesi takes smart contracts to the next level by implementing a variant of optimistic roll-ups. Cartesi is revolutionizing smart contracts by allowing developers to code with mainstream software stacks. Noether is Cartesi's high-performance and low cost data availability side-chain.

tokens.name: ELF Token
tokens.description: aelf is an innovative open-source blockchain network designed as a complete business solution. The structure of ‘one main chain + multiple side chains’ allows developers to independently deploy or run DApps (Distributed Applications) on individual side chains to achieve effective resource isolation.

tokens.name: Anyswap-BEP20
tokens.description: Anyswap is a fully decentralized cross chain swap protocol, with automated pricing and liquidity system.

tokens.name: Reef.finance
tokens.description: Reef Finance is a multi-chain smart yield engine and liquidity aggregator for any DeFi protocol to integrate with.

tokens.name: Sun Token
tokens.description: SUN.io platform is TRON's one-stop platform that supports stablecoin swap, token mining and self-governance. After the redenomination, the new SUN token, as a multifunctional governance token on the SUN platform.

tokens.name: Alien Worlds Trilium
tokens.description:
Alien Worlds is a NFT blockchain game in the world with over 4,000 unique users per hour.
First-generation collectible-only NFTs were “dead” but Alien Worlds’ NFTs come to life with their gaming utility.

tokens.name: Band Protocol Token
tokens.description: Band Protocol is a cross-chain data oracle platform that aggregates and connects real-world data and APIs to smart contracts.

tokens.name: AlphaToken
tokens.description: Alpha Finance Lab is an ecosystem of DeFi products and focused on building an ecosystem of automated yield-maximizing Alpha products that interoperate to bring optimal alpha to users on a cross-chain level.

tokens.name: Wrapped MIR Token
tokens.description: Mirror Protocol allows the creation of fungible assets, “synthetics”, that track the price of real world assets. Mirror synthetics are intended to be used as key building blocks in smart contracts, and to bring the world’s assets to the blockchain.

tokens.name: PolkastarterToken
tokens.description: Polkastarter is a DEX built for cross-chain token sales and auctions, enabling projects to raise capital on a decentralised and interoperable environment based on Polkadot.

tokens.name: DODO bird
tokens.description: DODO is a on-chain liquidity provider, which leverages the Proactive Market Maker algorithm (PMM) to provide pure on-chain and contract-fillable liquidity.

tokens.name: StandardBTCHashrateToken
tokens.description: Bitcoin Standard Hashrate Token (BTCST) brings exchange-grade liquidity to Bitcoin mining. Each BTCST is collateralized by real Bitcoin mining power.

tokens.name: Ellipsis
tokens.description: Ellipsis Finance aims to offer secure low-slippage stable swapping.

tokens.name: Venus
tokens.description: Venus is an algorithmic money market and synthetic stablecoin decentralized finance protocol.

tokens.name: ALICE
tokens.description: My Neighbor Alice is a multiplayer builder game, where anyone can buy and own virtual islands, collect and build exciting items and meet new friends. The game combines a fun narrative for regular players and an ecosystem for players who want to collect and trade Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs).

tokens.name: BakeryToken
tokens.description: An AMM Dex on BNB Smart Chain.

tokens.name: Automata
tokens.description: Automata is a privacy middleware layer for dApps across multiple blockchains, built on a decentralized service protocol.

tokens.name: SafePal Token
tokens.description: SafePal is a cryptocurrency wallet that helps users to protect and grow their decentralized assets.

tokens.name: CertiK Token
tokens.description: CertiK provides security infrastructure for the blockchain. It features various projects - CertiK security oracle, CertiK shield and CertiK Chain.

tokens.name: YFII.finance Token
tokens.description: DFI.Money (YFII) is a DeFi platform which aims to build products on aggregated liquidity provision, leveraged trading, automated marketing making.

tokens.name: AlpacaToken
tokens.description: Alpaca Finance is the first leveraged yield farming protocol on BNB Smart Chain. It will be integrated with PancakeSwap and allow users to open leveraged yield farming positions by borrowing assets from vaults.

tokens.name: Komodo
tokens.description: Komodo platform aims to offer End-to-End blockchain solutions for business.

tokens.name: LTO Network
tokens.description: LTO Network is a hybrid blockchain for securing, verifying and exchanging business critical information.

tokens.name: Contentos
tokens.description: Contentos is a decentralized global content ecosystem invested by Binance Labs, DHVC and various class-leading funds.

tokens.name: AdEx Network
tokens.description: Decentralized Ad Network

tokens.name: Chess
tokens.description: Tranchess Protocol is a tokenized asset management and derivatives trading protocol. Tranchess aims to provide different risk/return matrix out of a single main fund that tracks a specific underlying asset.

tokens.name: Phala Network
tokens.description: Phala Network is a privacy-preserving cloud computing service, which offers computing power comparable to existing cloud services and protects the privacy of managed programs.

tokens.name: TornadoCash
tokens.description: Tornado Cash is a fully decentralized protocol for private transactions on Ethereum.

tokens.name: Tokocrypto Token
tokens.description: Tokocrypto is a local Indonesian cryptocurrency project to offer a unique hybrid CeFi and DeFi token model.

tokens.name: Litentry
tokens.description: Litentry is a decentralized Identity Aggregation protocol across multiple networks which features a DID indexing mechanism and a substrate-based credit computation network.

tokens.name: Frontier Token
tokens.description: Frontier is a chain-agnostic DeFi aggregation layer. Users can participate in protocol tracking and management, staking, best-rate asset swapping, liquidity provision, CDP creation & monitoring, and more.

tokens.name: Measurable Data Token
tokens.description: Measurable Data Token (MDT) is a decentralized data exchange ecosystem connecting users, data providers, and data buyers and denominates the value of data.

tokens.name: MANTRA DAO
tokens.description: MANTRA DAO is a community-governed DeFi platform focusing on staking, lending, and governance.

tokens.name: dForce
tokens.description: dForce advocates for building an integrated and interoperable and scalable open finance protocol network, cultivating intra-protocol liquidity and network effects, while remain in full openness to interact and integrated with other protocols.

tokens.name: RAMP DEFI
tokens.description: A multi-chain DeFi protocol that aims to help asset owners achieve capital efficiency by offering a powerful and comprehensive solution to multi-task users’ crypto-assets, maximizing the value and returns.

tokens.name: Burger Swap
tokens.description: BurgerSwap, a democratized AMM.

tokens.name: FC Santos Fan Token
tokens.description: Licensed fan token of the Brazilian football club Santos FC.

tokens.name: The Force Token
tokens.description: The Force Protocol proposes three DeFi technical components: fundamental component, extended component, and financial component. It aims to launch ForTube - DeFi lending platform.

tokens.name: AUTOv2
tokens.description: Autofarm is a yield optimizer platform focused on providing defi users with auto-compounded yields at the empirical optimal interval.

tokens.name: Token Club
tokens.description: TokenClub (TCT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform.

tokens.name: Firo
tokens.description: Firo is a decentralized, open source, privacy-focused cryptocurrency. Firo transactions can utilize private Lelantus transactions that remove any associated transaction history from the coins.

tokens.name: Bat True Share
tokens.description: Bat Dollar is an algorithmic stablecoin on BNB Smart Chain.

tokens.name: Linear Token
tokens.description: Linear Finance is a cross-chain compatible, decentralized synthetic asset protocol to cost-effectively and quickly create, trade, and manage synthetic assets (Liquids).

tokens.name: WINk
tokens.description: WINk aims to build on its market position as a leading blockchain gaming platform through the consistent introduction of high-quality decentralized applications (DApps).

tokens.name: FC Porto Fan Token
tokens.description: FC Porto Fan Token is built on the BNB Smart Chain empowering FC Porto fans with broader accessibility, more functionalities and lower fees.

tokens.name: Perlin
tokens.description: PerlinX is democratizing the trading of real-world assets through decentralized liquidity pools and synthetic asset generation.
